subject: p13448574
History: History of sarcoidosis and liver transplant.
Findings: The heart is normal in size. The mediastinal and hilar contours appear within normal limits and do not suggest substantial lymph node enlargement. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The lungs appear clear. Mild degenerative changes are similar along the thoracic spine.
Impression: No evidence of acute disease. No convincing evidence for sarcoidosis.
